metadata.title: Britney Spears - Break The Ice (Official HD Video)
metadata.creator: Britney Spears

tracks.text: This video has the style of 90's anime.
Humanoid figures float in green fluid, connected by wires
A city at night.
A blonde woman, Britney Spears, in a skin tight black outfit stands on a rooftop, her hair blowing in the wind.
She jumps off the roof, and falls backwards towards the street.
She crashes into a yellow glass dome
and lands in a deep fountain at the center
The shattering glass flies through the air, reflecting the scared faces of the building's patrons.
Spears emerges from the fountain
She walks forward. The stunned crowd watches.
Bodyguards emerge from all sides. She smiles.
An 8 foot tall man with a monstrous face pushes the bodyguards out of his way
Spears stands, hand on hip. The 8 foot man glows with a purple aura, and his eyes turn red.
He glares, she smirks, he roars. His clothes explode off his body as he runs towards, fist outstretched
Spears turns a heel and roundhouse kicks hims.
He spins in the air and lands face first. Spears brings her foot down, her toe smoking.
She mouths something. Her face appears across dozens of screens and holograms as men in shoot bark orders.
Red text flashes "Breach"
Red alarms flare
Several uniformed, gloved arms ready long, glowing sticks.
Forces carrying riot shields labelled "Victory" run across a strobing red background
In a white glowing room, Spears stands in front of a glowing safe door. She stands in front of a panel and puts on a glove.
She puts her hand on a panel and it scans it. A green light scans her eyeball.
The door apertures open, and another sides apart. Wind blows into the opened room.
Spears walks slowly through rows of upside down humanoid figures, covered in wires, floating in tanks.
We zoom out, revealing several more rows of stacks of tanks.
She stands at a control panel, which lifts up.
She adjusts lights on the console, and stops in front of a tank
She stares at the humanoid robot, and her lips approach the tank.
She smiles. A small device with a timer is stuck to the side of the tank. She presses a button, and the time is 1 minute.
58 seconds
She walks away. Several other tanks have timers.
A door opens. A man sits on a cancerous couch, with the city in the background.
The man shoos away 2 women as Spears approaches
She leans in towards him, and he reaches out to her.
She smacks his face. His eyes narrow.
She holds his face as sweat beads on his brow
She kisses him, eyes open
His legs go slack
His eyes glow as yellow circuitry runs from his pupils across his face.
Spears watches as he convulses. A gun scope watches her from across the street.
In another room, armored men with glowing beaded sticks stand at the ready.
Spears looks directly at the scope, and leans back. In slowed time, a bullet breaks through the window. She barely evades the bullet.
The armored men rush in
Spears leaps away, pushing off of the no longer convulsing man. His skin falls aside, revealing a short circuiting android.
She lands. Armored men drag glowing sticks.
15 seconds.
Spears stands in a large room, facing dozens of armored men.
11 seconds
She holds a small, strobing device
The device flies through the air, leaving a trail of smoke
0 seconds
A fiery explosion
In the flash, there are silhouettes shattered android pieces and broken wire.
Spears runs away in the purple smoke.
She jumps at the bullet hole in the window, crashing through as the explosion races towards her
A massive building labelled Victory explodes. A tiny figure flies out of the top floor, riding the shockwave.
Cut to black. Red text appears. To be continued.
